column6: Unique modern townhouse located in the Midtown district in the heart of the city! Convenient location less than 1 mile from downtown, 2 miles from the Museum District, and 3 miles from the Med Center. This townhouse is within a few miles of the universities. There is a metro-link rail within a 10 minute walk that can take you to the NRG Stadium, and the bus stop is just around the corner less than a minute walk away. \n\nYou can also rent a bike down the street at the neighborhood park!
